review: A family friend recommended Dr. Neena when I was unable to find an understanding *** ************* gynaecologist for my first pregnancy. Dr. Neena has all the qualities of an amazing gynaecologist that a patient would look for. *** *** ***** ********* ** *** ***** *** very considerate towards her patient’s concerns. She finds a middle path to make the patient feel comfortable along with the pregnancy to progress in the right direction. I highly recommend Dr. Neena Singh.

I consulted Dr. Neena since the time I found out that I was pregnant. She guided me smoothly throughout my pregnancy. She was able to fore-see the issues that I ended up facing due to my over weight and had prepared me and my body to deal with the same.  As a high risk pregnancy, I had a positive and hassle free experience. Dr. Neena was very responsive and always only a call/text away and that kept all my fears at bay. Very thankful to Dr. Neena and her team including Ms. Anu.

My pregnancy and childbirth has been such a smooth journey and that wouldn’t have been possible without  Dr.Neena’s expertise and gentle care. 
It’s rare to find a doctor who has a humanistic approach towards dealing with patients. She takes care of your physical as well as mental health. For a person who was scared to even give a blood sample, I effortlessly gave birth to my baby through a Normal Vaginal Delivery that too without an epidural! All thanks to Dr. Neena.

I had a beautiful experience with Dr Neena Mam. She is very kind hearted, caring and was available every time when I needed support. Pregnancy takes a toll over your mind and every visit to her made me positive and altogether a wonderful experience. I had a normal delivery and felt so easy as was in much capable hands.
Thank you so so much!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to her clinic with my wife. She listened to her very patiently and provided her very friendly environment so that she could speak about her issues with out any hesitation. Doctor is very sober and soft spoken. She prescribed medicines with their respective alternatives also. She elaborated everything about treatment, tests and medicines and moved step by step during treatment. She gives good time to her patients. I strongly recommend her.

Having a good doctor is very hard to find and I am so grateful to get one! My journey with Dr Neena Singh Kumar has been a very pleasant one.I have had both my girls in ma’am’s hands.Both my pregnancies had some major complications but never for once,ma’am had me & my family worried.She worked through both of them with so much ease ,calmness and confidence.
She’s a doctor who’s a true epitome of knowledge,professionalism,care and humbleness.
I can say that I am so blessed to have her as my DOC for life !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,
review: I am very thankful to Dr. Neena Singh Kumar for helping, cool and kindness suggestion, and patiently taking care of my wife's pregnancy. Her suggestion and taking care like a family member, I have ever seen Dr. like Neena, I always recommend people nearby  me to consult Dr. Neena if they try family planning. I am very very very thankful to you ma'am.
